src_original: sa niṣkramann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvān saṃsāracārakān niṣkrāmayeyaṃ /
tgt_original: 若出塔寺，願一切眾生永離生死；

src_original: sa labhanadvāram udghāṭayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvānāṃ lokôttareṇa jñānena nirvāṇasugatidvāram udghāṭayeyaṃ /  sa pithad evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
tgt_original: 若開門時，願一切眾生開善趣門；

src_original: sarvasatvānāṃ sarvâpāyadvārāṇi pidadhyāṃ /  sa niṣīdann evaṃ*cittam utpādayati /
tgt_original: 若閉門時，願一切眾生閉惡趣門；

src_original: sarvasatvān bodhimaṇḍe niṣādayeyaṃ /  sa dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
tgt_original: 若欲坐時，願一切眾生當坐道場；

src_original: sarvasatvān eva parinirvāpayeyaṃ /  sa tato vyuttiṣṭhann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
tgt_original: 若欲起時，願一切眾生於煩惱淤埿悉令超出；

src_original: sa tathāgatacaitye vā tathāgatavigrahe vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dadat sarvasatvānāṃ dauḥśīlyadaurgandhyamalâpanayanāya tathāgataśīlapratilambhāya ca pariṇāmayati /
tgt_original: 香華供養諸佛形像、塔廟，以是善根願令一切眾生悉除破戒、非法臭穢，當使一切眾生皆得諸佛戒香之身。

src_original: sa sanmārjanôpalepanaṃ kurvan sarvasatvānām aprāsādikêryāpathavigamāya /  prāsādikêryāpathasaṃpade ca pariṇāmayati /
tgt_original: 若有掃塔塗地，願使一切眾生悉得端正莊嚴之具；

src_original: sa puṣpacchatram āropayan sarvasatvānāṃ sarvakleśaparidāhavigamāya pariṇāmayati /
tgt_original: 若以華蓋供養佛塔，願一切眾生除煩惱熱；

src_original: sa vihāraṃ praviśann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvān nirvāṇapuraṃ praveśayeyaṃ /
tgt_original: 若入僧坊、塔寺，願一切眾生入涅槃城；
